title: Adjust aamMATIC APY
body:
📉 Given the sharp drops in APYs on the Matic deposits on the Aave Polygon deployment, the core team is proposing an early recalculation of the Tranche A Matic (aamMATIC) APY to 0.30% from 0.94% based on the historical average - 3STD deviation calculation.

🧮 This will create a more representative Tranche A calculation for the APY due to the ongoing drops in the Matic APYs from Aave Polygon, which will promote and incentivize solvency within the Tranche itself.

❗ Summary:

- Adjust the Tranche A Fixed APY on Aave-Polygon Matic (aamMATIC) to 0.30% from 0.94%.
author: 0x5C356190cd2aFd1806a151298e0A0001bDD5F542
